name: Reaper (itch) (TheXandan)
description:
Take on the role of an fisher of the damned who spends his days in an office building catching lost souls and reading emails!  Who knows what can happen in the most hellish work environment around!

Controls:

Main Screen:

Z - Go to River of Souls

X - Check Emails

River of Souls:

Z - Go Fishing

X - Return to main screen

Z - Return to main screen after catching a soul

Email Client:

Z - Open/Close Emails

X - Return to main screen

Up/Down - Change selected email

Fishing Game:

Press Z when you see the ! icon.  Do not press it when you see the ? icon!
